quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
name: Confucius

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.

quote: Be true to your work, your word, and your friend.

quote: My work is the only ground I've ever had to stand on. I seem to have a whole superstructure with no foundation but I'm working on the foundation.

quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed - there's so little competition.

quote: I have been all things unholy. If God can work through me, he can work through anyone.

name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The world is full of willing people some willing to work, the rest willing to let them.
name: Robert Frost

quote: A lot of people quit looking for work as soon as they find a job.

quote: I myself would like to become more disciplined within my work.

quote: My work is the only ground I've ever had to stand on. To put it bluntly, I seem to have a whole superstructure with no foundation, but I'm working on the foundation.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Leaders aren't born they are made. And they are made just like anything else, through hard work. And that's the price we'll have to pay to achieve that goal, or any goal.

quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.

quote: Deficiency motivation doesn't work. It will lead to a life-long pursuit of try to fix me. Learn to appreciate what you have and where and who you are.

quote: My message, especially to young people is to have courage to think differently, courage to invent, to travel the unexplored path, courage to discover the impossible and to conquer the problems and succeed. name: Abdul Kalam

quote: If God can work through me, he can work through anyone.
name: Francis of Assisi

quote: The reason a lot of people do not recognize opportunity is because it usually goes around wearing overalls looking like hard work.

quote: If you like small government you need to work hard at having a strong national defense that is not so militant. quote: When I was young, I observed that nine out of ten things I did were failures. So I did ten times more work.

quote: It feels good to have your work respected again.

quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.
name: Colin Powell

quote: Few will have the greatness to bend history itself but each of us can work to change a small portion of events, and in the total of all those acts will be written the history of this generation.
name: Robert Kennedy

quote: One is not idle because one is absorbed. There is both visible and invisible labor. To contemplate is to toil, to think is to do. The crossed arms work, the clasped hands act. The eyes upturned to Heaven are an act of creation.

quote: If you're interested in 'balancing' work and pleasure, stop trying to balance them. Instead make your work more pleasurable.
name: Donald Trump

quote: Happiness is ideal, it is the work of the imagination.
name: Marquis de Sade

quote: If you do not feel yourself growing in your work and your life broadening and deepening, if your task is not a perpetual tonic to you, you have not found your place.
name: Orison Swett Marden

quote: I work really hard at trying to see the big picture and not getting stuck in ego. I believe we're all put on this planet for a purpose, and we all have a different purpose... When you connect with that love and that compassion, that's when everything unfolds.
name: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: I do not believe in excuses. I believe in hard work as the prime solvent of life's problems.

quote: The work an unknown good man has done is like a vein of water flowing hidden underground, secretly making the ground green.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: I suppose I have a really loose interpretation of 'work,' because I think that just being alive is so much work at something you don't always want to do. The machinery is always going. Even when you sleep.

quote: Fires can't be made with dead embers, nor can enthusiasm be stirred by spiritless men. Enthusiasm in our daily work lightens effort and turns even labor into pleasant tasks.
name: James A. Baldwin

quote: In action a great heart is the chief qualification. In work, a great head.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: To say that a work of art is good, but incomprehensible to the majority of men, is the same as saying of some kind of food that it is very good but that most people can't eat it.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Anybody who has been seriously engaged in scientific work of any kind realizes that over the entrance to the gates of the temple of science are written the words: 'Ye must have faith.'
name: Max Planck

quote: If children understand that beliefs should be substantiated with evidence, as opposed to tradition, authority, revelation or faith, they will automatically work out for themselves that they are atheists.
name: Richard Dawkins

quote: Behold a worthy sight, to which the God, turning his attention to his own work, may direct his gaze. Behold an equal thing, worthy of a God, a brave man matched in conflict with evil fortune.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: To make democracy work, we must be a notion of participants, not simply observers. One who does not vote has no right to complain.
name: Louis L'Amour

quote: You don't have to turn on the TV set. You don't have to work on the Internet. It's up to you.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: Oh, give us the man who sings at his work.

quote: Without this playing with fantasy no creative work has ever yet come to birth. The debt we owe to the play of the imagination is incalculable.
name: Carl Jung

quote: Why does a woman work ten years to change a man's habits and then complain that he's not the man she married?
name: Barbra Streisand

quote: All great art is the work of the whole living creature, body and soul, and chiefly of the soul.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Nothing is void of God, his work is everywhere his full of himself.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The last thing one discovers in composing a work is what to put first.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: The better a work is, the more it attracts criticism it is like the fleas who rush to jump on white linens.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: I do not suppose I shall be remembered for anything. But I don't think about my work in those terms. It is just as vulgar to work for the sake of posterity as to work for the sake of money.

quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
name: Stanislaw Lec

quote: Never despair, but if you do, work on in despair.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: Character is the indelible mark that determines the only true value of all people and all their work.

quote: The United States strongly condemns the illegal disclosure of classified information. It puts people's lives in danger, threatens our national security, and undermines our efforts to work with other countries to solve shared problems.

quote: The only happiness a brave person ever troubles themselves in asking about, is happiness enough to get their work done.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: There is a computer disease that anybody who works with computers knows about. It's a very serious disease and it interferes completely with the work. The trouble with computers is that you 'play' with them!

quote: People who have time on their hands will inevitably waste the time of people who have work to do.

quote: Company cultures are like country cultures. Never try to change one. Try, instead, to work with what you've got.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: Actors work and slave and it is the color of your hair that can determine your fate in the end.

name: Ed Bradley

quote: The productivity of work is not the responsibility of the worker but of the manager.

name: Nhat Hanh

quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.

quote: When you discover your mission, you will feel its demand. It will fill you with enthusiasm and a burning desire to get to work on it.

quote: You have not found your place until all your faculties are roused, and your whole nature consents and approves of the work you are doing.

quote: God continues to work miracles in my life.

quote: The black market was a way of getting around government controls. It was a way of enabling the free market to work. It was a way of opening up, enabling people.

quote: A person however learned and qualified in his life's work in whom gratitude is absent, is devoid of that beauty of character which makes personality fragrant.

quote: I've got a theory that if you give 100% all of the time, somehow things will work out in the end.

quote: I wanted to be a doctor that I might be able to work without having to talk because for years I had been giving myself out in words.

quote: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.

quote: So much of what we call management consists in making it difficult for people to work.

quote: Healthy people are those who live in healthy homes on a healthy diet in an environment equally fit for birth, growth work, healing, and dying... Healthy people need no bureaucratic interference to mate, give birth, share the human condition and die.

quote: Never follow somebody else's path it doesn't work the same way twice for anyone... the path follows you and rolls up behind you as you walk, forcing the next person to find their own way.

quote: Winners take time to relish their work, knowing that scaling the mountain is what makes the view from the top so exhilarating.

quote: The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work.

quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.

quote: To work all the time is to be incredibly lucky.

quote: I have to work really hard, eight shows a week, to get a nice check as an actor. But when I write a play, and it's a - knock wood - hit, the checks come in for many years.

quote: Some slaves are scoured to their work by whips, others by their restlessness and ambition.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Email, instant messaging, and cell phones give us fabulous communication ability, but because we live and work in our own little worlds, that communication is totally disorganized.
name: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: Love knows how to form itself. God will do his work if we do ours. Our job is to prepare ourselves for love. When we do, love finds us every time.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: When a great many people are unable to find work, unemployment results.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Cease trying to work everything out with your minds. It will get you nowhere. Live by intuition and inspiration and let your whole life be Revelation.
name: Eileen Caddy

quote: One thing I hope I'll never be is drunk with my own power. And anybody who says I am will never work in this town again.
name: Jim Carrey

name: William J. Clinton

quote: Tranquilizers work only if you follow the advice on the bottle - keep away from children.
name: Phyllis Diller

quote: Mothers always find ways to fit in the work - but then when you're working, you feel that you should be spending time with your children and then when you're with your children, you're thinking about working.

quote: Democrats think the country works better with a strong middle class, real opportunities for poor people to work their way into it and a relentless focus on the future, with business and government working together to promote growth and broadly shared prosperity. quote: Tell the truth. Sing with passion. Work with laughter. Love with heart. 'Cause that's all that matters in the end.

quote: If you want to become a great chef, you have to work with great chefs. And that's exactly what I did.
name: Gordon Ramsay

name: John Ruskin

quote: The first condition of education is being able to put someone to wholesome and meaningful work.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Men don't and can't live by exchanging articles, but by producing them. They don't live by trade, but by work. Give up that foolish and vain title of Trades Unions and take that of laborers Unions.
name: John Ruskin

name: Jim Carrey

quote: I love my wife and I know she loves me. We're best friends. We're just lucky to have found each other. It takes a lot of work but I just feel very blessed that I found the right person. It's a very fortunate situation and not everyone has that.

quote: God gives talent. Work transforms talent into genius.
name: Anna Pavlova

quote: Don't ever, ever, believe anyone who tells you that you can just get by, by doing the easiest thing possible. Because there's always somebody behind you who really wants to do what you're doing. And they're going to work harder than you if you're not working hard.
name: Maria Bartiromo

quote: Men cannot not live by exchanging articles, but producing them. They live by work not trade.
name: John Ruskin

quote: The work of science is to substitute facts for appearances, and demonstrations for impressions.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Nearly all the powerful people of this age are unbelievers, the best of them in doubt and misery, the most in plodding hesitation, doing as well as they can, what practical work lies at hand.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Whether for life or death, do your own work well.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Men were not intended to work with the accuracy of tools, to be precise and perfect in all their actions.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Better the rudest work that tells a story or records a fact, than the richest without meaning.
name: John Ruskin

quote: When large numbers of men are unable to find work, unemployment results.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Advertising ministers to the spiritual side of trade. It is great power that has been entrusted to your keeping which charges you with the high responsibility of inspiring and ennobling the commercial world. It is all part of the greater work of the regeneration and redemption of mankind.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: My family kinda hit the skids. We were experiencing poverty at that point. We all got a job, where the whole family had to work as security guards and janitors. And I just got angry.
name: Jim Carrey

quote: I'm the first to admit this whole salary thing is getting out of control. In the final analysis, it's still about the work.
name: Jim Carrey

quote: A good idea is about ten percent and implementation and hard work, and luck is 90 percent.
name: Guy Kawasaki

quote: The path of least resistance and least trouble is a mental rut already made. It requires troublesome work to undertake the alternation of old beliefs.
name: John Dewey

quote: Every person born into this world their work is born with them.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: The message that President Obama delivered in his speech at Notre Dame was: morality is immoral. Pro-life is the extremist position, not a moral position. name: Rush Limbaugh

quote: The man of genius is he and he alone who finds such joy in his art that he will work at it come hell or high water.
name: Stendhal

quote: I write to keep from going mad from the contradictions I find among mankind - and to work some of those contradictions out for myself.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Representation of the world, like the world itself, is the work of men they describe it from their own point of view, which they confuse with the absolute truth.
name: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: It is now for the Catholic Church to bend herself to her work with calmness and generosity. It is for you to observe her with renewed and friendly attention.
name: Pope John XXIII

quote: Simplicity and repose are the qualities that measure the true value of any work of art.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: From the depth of need and despair, people can work together, can organize themselves to solve their own problems and fill their own needs with dignity and strength.
name: Cesar Chavez

quote: We all hoped in 2001 that we could put in place an Afghan government under President Karzai that would be able to control the country, make sure al-Qaeda didn't come back, and make sure the Taliban wasn't resurging. It didn't work out.
name: Colin Powell

quote: I don't know that there is much the United States can do except work with the international community.
name: Colin Powell

quote: Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work.
name: Bette Davis

quote: Nature is so powerful, so strong. Capturing its essence is not easy - your work becomes a dance with light and the weather. It takes you to a place within yourself.
name: Annie Leibovitz

quote: I am trying to show the world that we are all human beings and that color is not important. What is important is the quality of our work.

quote: How can people be so stupid? I marvel at that. See, I think you have to work as being ignorant - and if you're gonna work at being ignorant, why not work at being informed?
name: Rush Limbaugh

quote: Millions of young Americans have graduated from college during the Obama presidency, ready to use their gifts and get moving in life. name: Paul Ryan

quote: God was satisfied with his own work, and that is fatal.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Work with some men is as besetting a sin as idleness.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves strong. The amount of work is the same.
name: Carlos Castenada

quote: Think of and look at your work as though it were done by your enemy. I you look at it to admire it, you are lost.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Designing is my hobby. If I didn't do what I do for a living - at some point when I don't do this for a living - I'll probably just do design work. I love finding really special pieces of furniture.
name: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: I like work it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours.
name: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: The only work that will ultimately bring any good to any of us is the work of contributing to the healing of the world.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: I do the same exercises I did 50 years ago and they still work. I eat the same food I ate 50 years ago and it still works.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I stayed away from mathematics not so much because I knew it would be hard work as because of the amount of time I knew it would take, hours spent in a field where I was not a natural.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: I think the one thing this picture shows that's new is the psychological disproportion of the kids' demands on the parents. Parents are often at fault, but the kids have some work to do, too.
name: James Dean

quote: God gave us faculties for our use each of them will receive its proper reward. Then do not let us try to charm them to sleep, but permit them to do their work until divinely called to something higher.
name: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: If you work just for money, you'll never make it, but if you love what you're doing and you always put the customer first, success will be yours.
name: Ray Kroc

quote: The theater needs continual reminders that there is nothing more debasing than the work of those who do well what is not worth doing at all.
name: Gore Vidal

quote: An audience is always warming but it must never be necessary to your work.
name: Gertrude Stein

quote: I understand what's it like to work all week and on Friday night just want to go and leave your brain at the door, buy some popcorn and be thrilled by something.
name: Don Cheadle

quote: If you work hard and play by the rules, this country is truly open to you. You can achieve anything.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Inspiration is one thing and you can't control it, but hard work is what keeps the ship moving. Good luck means, work hard. Keep up the good work.
name: Kevin Eubanks

quote: Men's magazines often feature pictures of naked ladies. Women's magazines also often feature pictures of naked ladies. This is because the female body is a beautiful work of art, while the male body is hairy and lumpy and should not be seen by the light of day.
name: Richard Roeper

quote: It's definitely a dream come true to be recognized and to be able to sign autographs. But, it's also a lot of hard work and can be draining. If you don't know already, you will quickly learn who your real friends are.
name: Christina Aguilera

quote: Whatever you do, do it with all your might. Work at it, early and late, in season and out of season, not leaving a stone unturned, and never deferring for a single hour that which can be done just as well now.
name: P. T. Barnum

quote: An honest man's the noblest work of God.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Hope is a state of mind, not of the world. Hope, in this deep and powerful sense, is not the same as joy that things are going well, or willingness to invest in enterprises that are obviously heading for success, but rather an ability to work for something because it is good.
name: Vaclav Havel

quote: We are free, but not to be evil, not to be indifferent to human suffering, not to profit from the people, from the work created and sustained through their spirit of political association, while refusing to contribute to the political state that we profit from.
name: Jose Marti

quote: An honest God is the noblest work of man.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Reality is easy. It's deception that's the hard work.
name: Lauryn Hill

quote: All of us are guinea pigs in the laboratory of God. Humanity is just a work in progress.
name: Tennessee Williams

quote: A large part of acting is just pretending. You get to work with these other great make-believers, all making believe as hard as they can.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: Who gets the risks? The risks are given to the consumer, the unsuspecting consumer and the poor work force. And who gets the benefits? The benefits are only for the corporations, for the money makers.
name: Cesar Chavez

quote: And it hurts as a player, that you put a lot of hard work in during the week, and at the end of the week, Sunday, when you get on the field, that's when they acknowledge about the hard work that you put in throughout the week. That's actually a disappointment.
name: Randy Moss

quote: The humanists' replacement for religion: work really hard and somehow you'll either save yourself or you'll be immortal. Of course, that's a total joke, and our progress is nothing. There may be progress in technology but there's no ethical progress whatsoever.
name: David Bowie

quote: A work of art which did not begin in emotion is not art.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: In scientific work, those who refuse to go beyond fact rarely get as far as fact.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: Every morning I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I'm not there, I go to work.
name: Robert Orben

quote: But I have a good life. I enjoy what I do. I am married to work.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Realize what you really want. It stops you from chasing butterflies and puts you to work digging gold.
name: William Moulton Marston

quote: I give thanks everyday that I've been able to take my craziness and make it work for me.
name: Fritz Scholder

quote: Hard work without talent is a shame, but talent without hard work is a tragedy.
name: Robert Half

quote: Motivation is everything. You can do the work of two people, but you can't be two people. Instead, you have to inspire the next guy down the line and get him to inspire his people.
name: Lee Iacocca

quote: Slang is a language that rolls up its sleeves, spits on its hands and goes to work.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: Man, unlike anything organic or inorganic in the universe, grows beyond his work, walks up the stairs of his concepts, emerges ahead of his accomplishments.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: While we are living in the present, we must celebrate life every day, knowing that we are becoming history with every work, every action, every deed.
name: Mattie Stepanek

quote: You've achieved success in your field when you don't know whether what you're doing is work or play.
name: Warren Beatty

quote: I know that many of you do wear such a cross of Christ, not in any ostentatious way, not in a way that might harm you at your work or recreation, but a simple indication that you value the role of Jesus Christ in the history of the world, that you are trying to live by Christ's standards in your own daily life.
name: Keith O'Brien

quote: I don't work at being ordinary.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: A work of art that contains theories is like an object on which the price tag has been left.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: There may be people who have more talent than you, but there's no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do - and I believe that.
name: Derek Jeter

quote: I don't mean to be arrogant and I really appreciate my fans but talking about what I am doing is not something I'm good at. I do what I do and that's it. I want to get back to my work and do more of it instead of talking about it.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Those who produce should have, but we know that those who produce the most - that is, those who work hardest, and at the most difficult and most menial tasks, have the least.
name: Eugene V. Debs

quote: Behaving like a princess is work. It's not just about looking beautiful or wearing a crown. It's more about how you are inside.
name: Julie Andrews

quote: Discrimination due to age is one of the great tragedies of modern life. The desire to work and be useful is what makes life worth living, and to be told your efforts are not needed because you are the wrong age is a crime.
name: Johnny Ball

quote: It's hard enough to work and raise a family when your kids are all healthy and relatively normal, but when you add on some kind of disability or disease, it can just be such a burden.
name: Patricia Heaton

quote: I know some people say I can be funny. But there is always a deeper meaning to what I say. I am a socialist at heart and have the interests of the poor in mind. When people see how I manage to work my way out of tough situations, it gives them hope in their own life.
name: Lalu Prasad Yadav

quote: Join the union, girls, and together say Equal Pay for Equal Work.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: I have so many things to work on, and so many ways that I fail. But that's what grace is all about. and I constantly wake up every morning trying to get better, trying to improve, trying to walk closer to God.
name: Tim Tebow

quote: I think the importance of doing activist work is precisely because it allows you to give back and to consider yourself not as a single individual who may have achieved whatever but to be a part of an ongoing historical movement.
name: Angela Davis

quote: It is our best work that God wants, not the dregs of our exhaustion. I think he must prefer quality to quantity.
name: George MacDonald

quote: My own image of my work is that I no sooner settle into something than a break occurs. These breaks are always painful and depressing but despite them I see that there's a consistency that holds out, but is hard to define.
name: Lee Krasner

quote: I approach love differently now that I know it's hard for it to work out.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: Be glad of life because it gives you the chance to love, to work, to play, and to look up at the stars.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Be aware of wonder. Live a balanced life - learn some and think some and draw and paint and sing and dance and play and work every day some.
name: Robert Fulghum

quote: Black History Month must be more than just a month of remembrance it should be a tribute to our history and reminder of the work that lies in the months and years ahead.
name: Marty Meehan

quote: This has always been a motto of mine: Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work.
name: Bette Davis

quote: Every work of art is an uncommitted crime.
name: Theodor Adorno

quote: The productivity now at universities is terrible. Tenure is a terrible idea. It keeps them around forever and they don't have to work hard.
name: Jack Welch

quote: I simply do not distinguish between work and play.
name: Mary Oliver

quote: Nature is my manifestation of God. I go to nature every day for inspiration in the day's work. I follow in building the principles which nature has used in its domain.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: A big part of who I am is just the way I was raised. Nobody is better than anyone else, and if you really work hard, you might get lucky and get what you want.
name: Martina McBride

quote: Therefore, when I considered this carefully, the contempt which I had to fear because of the novelty and apparent absurdity of my view, nearly induced me to abandon utterly the work I had begun.
name: Nicolaus Copernicus

quote: We are infected by our own misunderstanding of how our own minds work.
name: Kevin Kelly

quote: There is no prejudice that the work of art does not finally overcome.
name: Andre Gide

quote: Instead of asking 'How much damage will the work in question bring about?' why not ask 'How much good? How much joy?'
name: Henry Miller

quote: If you don't understand that you work for your mislabeled 'subordinates,' then you know nothing of leadership. You know only tyranny.
name: Dee Hock

quote: According to the U.S. Census, the most common reason people give for not voting is that they were too busy or had conflicting work or school schedules.
name: Jeff Miller

quote: I guess what I learned the most was to feel lucky with what I have been able to accomplish and what I have and to feel humble about the people I have been able to work with.
name: Stephen Dorff

quote: Italians know about human nature - they understand human nature perhaps better than anyone else does. They know that people are weak and greedy and lazy and dishonest and they just try to make the best of it to work around it.
name: Donna Leon

quote: Memory is a great artist. For every man and for every woman it makes the recollection of his or her life a work of art and an unfaithful record.
name: Andre Maurois

quote: Too much work, too much vacation, too much of any one thing is unsound.
name: Walter Annenberg

quote: I have discovered the secret of happiness - it is work, either with the hands or the head. The moment I have something to do, the draughts are open and my chimney draws, and I am happy.
name: John Burroughs

quote: Work is hard. Distractions are plentiful. And time is short.
name: Adam Hochschild

quote: To make our way, we must have firm resolve, persistence, tenacity. We must gear ourselves to work hard all the way. We can never let up.
name: Ralph Bunche

quote: The work of art assumes the existence of the perfect spectator, and is indifferent to the fact that no such person exists.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: Racism, in the first place, is a weapon used by the wealthy to increase the profits they bring in by paying Black workers less for their work.
name: Angela Davis

quote: Early to bed, early to rise, work like hell, and advertise.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Intelligence is the ability to avoid doing work, yet getting the work done.
name: Linus Torvalds

quote: I am doomed to an eternity of compulsive work. No set goal achieved satisfies. Success only breeds a new goal. The golden apple devoured has seeds. It is endless.
name: Bette Davis

quote: If we were logical, the future would be bleak, indeed. But we are more than logical. We are human beings, and we have faith, and we have hope, and we can work.
name: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: The artist must be in his work as God is in creation, invisible and all-powerful one must sense him everywhere but never see him.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Football taught me how hard you had to work to achieve something.
name: Kenny Chesney

quote: You just have to keep trying to do good work, and hope that it leads to more good work. I want to look back on my career and be proud of the work, and be proud that I tried everything. Yes, I want to look back and know that I was terrible at a variety of things.
name: Jon Stewart

quote: All the real work is done in the rehearsal period.
name: Donald Pleasence

quote: I think that everything is possible as long as you put your mind to it and you put the work and time into it. I think your mind really controls everything.
name: Michael Phelps

quote: We spend billions of pounds on welfare, yet millions are trapped on welfare. It's not worth their while going into work.
name: David Cameron

quote: I just get things done instead of talking about getting them done. I don't go out and party. I don't smoke, drink or do drugs and I'm not married, that leaves a lot of time for my work.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Every job is good if you do your best and work hard. A man who works hard stinks only to the ones that have nothing to do but smell.
name: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quote: I take the work seriously, just not myself in it.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Sometimes I feel an obligation to be accessible as a personality, but for me the driving force since the beginning has always been good work, taking risks, trying new things. If the door opens, go through it. Always go forwards.
name: David Soul

quote: If you want peace work for justice.
name: Pope Paul VI

quote: The great work must inevitably be obscure, except to the very few, to those who like the author himself are initiated into the mysteries. Communication then is secondary: it is perpetuation which is important. For this only one good reader is necessary.
name: Henry Miller

quote: No matter how vast, how total, the failure of man here on earth, the work of man will be resumed elsewhere. War leaders talk of resuming operations on this front and that, but man's front embraces the whole universe.
name: Henry Miller

quote: The worst sin that can be committed against the artist is to take him at his word, to see in his work a fulfillment instead of an horizon.
name: Henry Miller

quote: I think when you begin to think of yourself as having achieved something, then there's nothing left for you to work towards. I want to believe that there is a mountain so high that I will spend my entire life striving to reach the top of it.
name: Cicely Tyson

quote: I think the American Dream says that anything can happen if you work hard enough at it and are persistent, and have some ability. The sky is the limit to what you can build, and what can happen to you and your family.
name: Sanford I. Weill

quote: If something is irrational, that means it won't work. It's usually unrealistic.
name: Albert Ellis

quote: But marriage goes in waves. You've got to be patient. People bail and give up on their marriages way too early. They just don't put the work and the effort into it. You've got to suck up your ego a lot of times, because that can be a big downfall.
name: Anna Benson

quote: I'm Jewish. I don't work out. If God had wanted us to bend over, He would have put diamonds on the floor.
name: Joan Rivers

quote: A child, from the time he can think, should think about all he sees, should suffer for all who cannot live with honesty, should work so that all men can be honest, and should be honest himself.
name: Jose Marti

quote: Blessed is the man who has some congenial work, some occupation in which he can put his heart, and which affords a complete outlet to all the forces there are in him.
name: John Burroughs

quote: The work goes on, the cause endures, the hope still lives and the dreams shall never die.
name: Edward Kennedy

quote: Confidence comes from hours and days and weeks and years of constant work and dedication.
name: Roger Staubach

quote: I'm tired of hearing it said that democracy doesn't work. Of course it doesn't work. We are supposed to work it.
name: Alexander Woollcott

quote: Let me be a free man - free to travel, free to stop, free to work.
name: Chief Joseph

quote: The average person puts only 25% of his energy and ability into his work. The world takes off its hat to those who put in more than 50% of their capacity, and stands on its head for those few and far between souls who devote 100%.
name: Andrew Carnegie

quote: If you dream of something worth doing and then simply go to work on it and don't think anything of personalities, or emotional conflicts, or of money, or of family distractions it is amazing how quickly you get through those 5,000 steps.
name: Edwin Land

quote: At 35, I'm definitely starting to feel more like a grown-up than I ever have. There's nothing in my life that is childish or whimsical. Having fun is fantastic and I never want to lose a sense of that - and also, I think, you have to have that to put into your work or else it's going to feel stiff.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: Music is for people. The word 'pop' is simply short for popular. It means that people like it. I'm just a normal jerk who happens to make music. As long as my brain and fingers work, I'm cool.
name: Eddie Van Halen

quote: Music is the effort we make to explain to ourselves how our brains work. We listen to Bach transfixed because this is listening to a human mind.
name: Lewis Thomas

quote: If you have issues with family, friends, and people at work, try and solve these issues head on so you can move on and concentrate on having the life you want.
name: Heidi Klum

quote: The reward for work well done is the opportunity to do more.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: It seems as if an age of genius must be succeeded by an age of endeavour riot and extravagance by cleanliness and hard work.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: We learned about dignity and decency - that how hard you work matters more than how much you make... that helping others means more than just getting ahead yourself.
name: Michelle Obama

quote: A serious and good philosophical work could be written consisting entirely of jokes.
name: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: Are you in earnest? Seize this very minute! Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it. Only engage, and then the mind grows heated. Begin, and then the work will be completed.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: A bachelor is a man who comes to work each morning from a different direction.
name: Sholom Aleichem

quote: The only reason anyone goes to Broadway is because they can't get work in the movies.
name: Bette Davis

quote: Women are, in my view, natural peacemakers. As givers and nurturers of life, through their focus on human relationships and their engagement with the demanding work of raising children and protecting family life, they develop a deep sense of empathy that cuts through to underlying human realities.
name: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: The days you work are the best days.
name: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: You can work really hard, but if you're not training in the right way you're not going to improve and get to the level that you want to.
name: Michael Chang

quote: If a man cannot do brain work without stimulants of any kind, he had better turn to hand work it is an indication on Nature's part that she did not mean him to be a head worker.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: I don't want to die as long as I can work the minute I can not, I want to go.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: I was a senior in high school when I decided I wanted to work on ants as a career. I just fell in love with them, and have never regretted it.
name: E. O. Wilson

quote: In my heart, I'm an Alabaman who went up north to work.
name: E. O. Wilson

quote: It's not about how much movement you do, how much interaction there is, it just reeks of credibility if it's real. If it's contrived, it seems to work for a while for the people who can't filter out the real and unreal.
name: Fred Durst

quote: When I work, I work very hard. So I look to work with people who have that level of dedication. And I depend on that from everyone. From the director to my crews that I work with.
name: Tom Cruise

quote: The work on ants has profoundly affected the way I think about humans.
name: E. O. Wilson

quote: I can deal with people who watch me on stage but I am not good in communicating with people any other way than through my work.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: You don't have to twist my arm to work.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Oh, if I could but live another century and see the fruition of all the work for women! There is so much yet to be done.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Emotion resulting from a work of art is only of value when it is not obtained by sentimental blackmail.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: Change is such hard work.
name: Billy Crystal

quote: Find something in life that you love doing. If you make a lot of money, that's a bonus, and if you don't, you still won't hate going to work.
name: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: The leader who exercises power with honor will work from the inside out, starting with himself.
name: Blaine Lee

quote: We travel together, passengers on a little spaceship, dependent on it's vulnerable reserves of air and soil, all committed, for our safety, to it's security and peace. Preserved from annihilation only by the care, the work and the love we give our fragile craft.
name: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: The difference between people who believe they have books inside of them and those who actually write books is sheer cussed persistence - the ability to make yourself work at your craft, every day - the belief, even in the face of obstacles, that you've got something worth saying.
name: Jennifer Weiner

quote: I think like any marriage, especially when you've had divorced parents like myself you want to try even harder to make it work.
name: Princess Diana

quote: Let us realize that: the privilege to work is a gift, the power to work is a blessing, the love of work is success!
name: David O. McKay

quote: See, winners embrace hard work.
name: Lou Holtz

quote: I'm far from being god, but I work god damn hard.
name: Jay-Z

quote: I'm very happy. I like my work and the various aspects of it - going around the world, teaching the gospel according to St. Albert.
name: Albert Ellis

quote: If I go on a diet and work out, I'm always in a bad mood. I'd rather be a little heavier but nice.
name: Salma Hayek

quote: When your hobbies get in the way of your work - that's OK but when your hobbies get in the way of themselves... well.
name: Steve Martin

quote: If you watch a game, it's fun. If you play it, it's recreation. If you work at it, it's golf.
name: Bob Hope

quote: I guess we all like to be recognized not for one piece of fireworks, but for the ledger of our daily work.
name: Neil Armstrong

quote: You only live once - but if you work it right, once is enough.
name: Joe E. Lewis

quote: The beginning of a friendship, the fact that two people out of the thousands around them can meet and connect and become friends, seems like a kind of magic to me. But maintaining a friendship requires work. I don't mean that as a bad thing. Good art requires work as well.
name: Charles de Lint

quote: My work is like my vacation, so in a way every day is like Saturday.
name: Ludacris

quote: Work and struggle and never accept an evil that you can change.
name: Andre Gide

quote: My work is about my life, and what I want to do with it.
name: Alice Walker

quote: Nature is at work. Character and destiny are her handiwork. She gives us love and hate, jealousy and reverence. All that is ours is the power to choose which impulse we shall follow.
name: David Seabury

quote: In my work and in myself I reflect black people, women and men, as I reflect others. One day even the most self-protective ones will look into the mirror I provide and not be afraid.
name: Alice Walker

quote: I think life is full of challenges and problems. I don't believe that anyone is perfect. We all make mistakes. It's not a bed of roses, and you have to work real hard at it.
name: Nigel Mansell

quote: Wars and elections are both too big and too small to matter in the long run. The daily work - that goes on, it adds up.
name: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: The strongest influences in my life and my work are always whomever I love. Whomever I love and am with most of the time, or whomever I remember most vividly. I think that's true of everyone, don't you?
name: Tennessee Williams

quote: No man can call himself liberal, or radical, or even a conservative advocate of fair play, if his work depends in any way on the unpaid or underpaid labor of women at home, or in the office.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: God has ways of shaking the world when He is at work. He literally caused the ground to quake when Jesus died on the cross.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: I have three daughters, so I can't be as tough as I want to be. When you have kids - especially daughters - they know how to work you. They're a lot smarter than we are, that's for sure. But I'll be more tough on their boyfriends.
name: Tim McGraw

quote: The companies that survive longest are the one's that work out what they uniquely can give to the world not just growth or money but their excellence, their respect for others, or their ability to make people happy. Some call those things a soul.
name: Charles Handy

quote: I never work just to work. It's some combination of laziness and self-respect.
name: Harold Ramis

quote: I think the best place to work in football is England.
name: Jose Mourinho

quote: I will continue to work as hard as I can to make this organization proud. Every time I step on the field I will give everything I have and I will leave everything I have on the field every single Sunday.
name: Tim Tebow

quote: I love my work, I love the people I work with, I do the best I can.
name: Mandy Patinkin

quote: Good management consists in showing average people how to do the work of superior people.
name: John D. Rockefeller

quote: It's a great relationship when you can work with the person who you consider to be your soul mate.
name: Rick Derringer

quote: The effectiveness of work increases according to geometric progression if there are no interruptions.
name: Andre Maurois

quote: Barack Obama's enemies are the people who make this country work. Barack Obama's enemies are those who succeed. Those are the people whose income he wants to redistribute. Those are the people whose income he wants to take, using the power and the force of the federal government to do it.
name: Rush Limbaugh

quote: A doctor must work eighteen hours a day and seven days a week. If you cannot console yourself to this, get out of the profession.
name: Martin H. Fischer

quote: The trick is in what one emphasizes. We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves happy. The amount of work is the same.
name: Carlos Castaneda

quote: In our work and in our living, we must recognize that difference is a reason for celebration and growth, rather than a reason for destruction.
name: Audre Lorde

quote: Everyone has a story that makes me stronger. I know that the work I do is important and I enjoy it, but it is nice to hear the feedback of what we do to inspire others.
name: Richard Simmons

quote: One's work usually occupies more than half of one's waking life. Choosing work that does not bring happiness will lead to a life that is mostly disappointing.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: The biggest risk I've ever taken is going on American Idol and trying to be myself. I wasn't going to try too hard to conform, and I knew that it could possibly not work out.
name: Adam Lambert

quote: My childhood was safe and sane. No abuse and no traumas. I was surrounded by a large and loving family who taught me the importance of hard work and a meaningful education.
name: Ronnie James Dio

quote: I obviously take a lot of pride in what I do on the football field, because that has the ability to influence a lot of people. That puts smiles on people's faces. That gives people a pep in their step on Monday morning when they go back to work.
name: Drew Brees

quote: Be of service. Whether you make yourself available to a friend or co-worker, or you make time every month to do volunteer work, there is nothing that harvests more of a feeling of empowerment than being of service to someone in need.
name: Gillian Anderson

quote: Executive ability is deciding quickly and getting somebody else to do the work.
name: Earl Nightingale

quote: There are no right and wrong ways to work in this business, but there are some basic common-sense practices. Work very, very hard and always be prepared never give up and once you get the job, give them more than they ever expected: - Shine!
name: Jimmy Smits

quote: No theory is good unless it permits, not rest, but the greatest work. No theory is good except on condition that one use it to go on beyond.
name: Andre Gide

quote: We work in the dark - we do what we can - we give what we have. Our doubt is our passion and our passion is our task. The rest is the madness of art.
name: Henry James

quote: I don't think you can work on feelings in politics, apart from anything else, political change can come very unexpectedly, sometimes overnight when you least expect it.
name: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: I don't wait for moods. You accomplish nothing if you do that. Your mind must know it has got to get down to work.
name: Pearl S. Buck

quote: The perennial conviction that those who work hard and play by the rules will be rewarded with a more comfortable present and a stronger future for their children faces assault from just about every direction. That great enemy of democratic capitalism, economic inequality, is real and growing.
name: Jon Meacham

quote: Brains, integrity, and force may be all very well, but what you need today is Charm. Go ahead and work on your economic programs if you want to, I'll develop my radio personality.
name: Gracie Allen

quote: But the key to our marriage is the capacity to give each other a break. And to realize that it's not how our similarities work together it's how our differences work together.
name: Michael J. Fox

quote: Poetry is the work of poets, not of peoples or communities artistic creation can never be anything but the production of an individual mind.
name: Lascelles Abercrombie

quote: Politics in a literary work, is like a gun shot in the middle of a concert, something vulgar, and however, something which is impossible to ignore.
name: Stendhal

quote: All anyone asks for is a chance to work with pride.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: There are moments when you feel that the desire to work is fading, and the only way to bring it back is to get away from it, to put yourself in a state of frustration so you feel the need again.
name: Emmanuelle Beart

quote: At the end of the day, sleep is a barometer of your emotional health. And so if you're not in the right place where you need to be, then you're going to have voices keeping you up at night because you have to work through those issues.
name: Mehmet Oz

quote: Peace is not the product of a victory or a command. It has no finishing line, no final deadline, no fixed definition of achievement. Peace is a never-ending process, the work of many decisions.
name: Oscar Hammerstein II

quote: What is sad for women of my generation is that they weren't supposed to work if they had families. What were they going to do when the children are grown - watch the raindrops coming down the window pane?
name: Jackie Kennedy

quote: Liberals become indignant when you question their patriotism, but simultaneously work overtime to give terrorists a cushion for the next attack and laugh at dumb Americans who love their country and hate the enemy.
name: Ann Coulter

quote: People of genius do not excel in any profession because they work in it, they work in it because they excel.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: For the first time we're allowing developers who don't work at Facebook to develop applications just as if they were. That's a big deal because it means that all developers have a new way of doing business if they choose to take advantage of it. There are whole companies that are forming whose only product is a Facebook Platform application.
name: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: What I work hard at doing is staying on a path of being kind and showing and proving that I'm a good person to society. That's hard. The talent, that's a gift. I just came here like that.
name: Erykah Badu

quote: That is why the analogy of stealing does not work. With a thief, we want to know how much money he stole, and from whom. With the artist it is not how much he took and from whom, but what he did with it.
name: Lukas Foss

quote: I am living proof that the American dream still exists. It is still alive and well. There is only one trick, you have to be willing to roll up your sleeves and work very, very hard.
name: Paula Deen

quote: I get bored easily, so I need to do a lot. I've started a record label, so I get to nurture new talent and talk about music, which is a passion of mine. I've written another book. And I get to come to work and do the TV show, which is always really fun.
name: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: Hard work - I mean, does anybody use that term anymore? Laziness doesn't fly. It's all in the practice. It does take work and it ain't easy - but man, the rewards!
name: Susan Powter

quote: The greatest weariness comes from work not done.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: Some of the most famous books are the least worth reading. Their fame was due to their having done something that needed to be doing in their day. The work is done and the virtue of the book has expired.
name: Moliere

quote: Being a mother is quite tiring. There's not much time to do anything. You just rush around and it's hard work.
name: Kirsty Gallacher

quote: And I'm going to work as hard as I can... for cancer research and hopefully, maybe, we'll have some cures and some breakthroughs. I'd like to think I'm going to fight my brains out to be back here again next year for the Arthur Ashe recipient. I want to give it next year!
name: Jim Valvano

quote: You can't get there by bus, only by hard work and risk and by not quite knowing what you're doing. What you'll discover will be wonderful. What you'll discover will be yourself.
name: Alan Alda

quote: What moves those of genius, what inspires their work is not new ideas, but their obsession with the idea that what has already been said is still not enough.
name: Eugene Delacroix

quote: In reality, serendipity accounts for one percent of the blessings we receive in life, work and love. The other 99 percent is due to our efforts.
name: Peter McWilliams

quote: If you want to fight the evil you see in finance and industry, get to work reading the corporate filings, see if there has been fraud, and where you find it, report it to the SEC or write about it or blog about it.
name: Ben Stein

quote: Through selfless work, love of God grows in the heart. Then through his grace one realize him in course of time. God can be seen. One can talk to him as I am talking to you.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: A lot of me is very up, and you have to have light and shade. They are both important and you have to be able to balance them. You have to admit that sadness is part of you and that it enriches you. I use it in my work.
name: Imelda Staunton

quote: You should never have to say hello or goodbye. Even at work sometimes, and I know this is very unpopular, is that if I'm going to work every single day, I don't think you should have to hug people hello every single day when you come to work. I saw you Monday!
name: Mindy Kaling

quote: The only history is a mere question of one's struggle inside oneself. But that is the joy of it. One need neither discover Americas nor conquer nations, and yet one has as great a work as Columbus or Alexander, to do.
name: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life.
name: Marc Anthony

quote: Enjoy your sweat because hard work doesn't guarantee success, but without it you don't have a chance.
name: Alex Rodriguez

quote: All I do, really, is go to work and try to be professional, be on time and be prepared.
name: Ben Affleck

quote: And I have exposed myself to art so that my work has something beyond just the usual potter.
name: Beatrice Wood

quote: We treat our people like royalty. If you honor and serve the people who work for you, they will honor and serve you.
name: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Amidst all the clutter, beyond all the obstacles, aside from all the static, are the goals set. Put your head down, do the best job possible, let the flak pass, and work towards those goals.
name: Donald Rumsfeld

quote: The government is not your salvation. The government is not your road to prosperity. Hard work, education will take you far beyond what any government program can ever promise.
name: Mia Love

quote: Work joyfully and peacefully, knowing that right thoughts and right efforts inevitably bring about right results.
name: James Allen

quote: After all, it is hard to master both life and work equally well. So if you are bound to fake one of them, it had better be life.
name: Joseph Brodsky

quote: Inconsiderate, rude behavior drives me nuts. And I guess the inconsiderate rudeness of social ineptitude definitely fuels my work.
name: Cindy Sherman

quote: I believe in stopping work and eating lunch.
name: L'Wren Scott

quote: There is but one way for a president to deal with Congress, and that is continuously, incessantly, and without interruption. If it is really going to work, the relationship has got to be almost incestuous.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Nobody's a natural. You work hard to get good and then work to get better. It's hard to stay on top.
name: Paul Coffey

quote: Have thy tools ready. God will find thee work.
name: Charles Kingsley

quote: To work without attachment is to work without the expectation of reward or fear of any punishment in this world or the next. Work so done is a means to the end, and God is the end.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: What we really want to do is what we are really meant to do. When we do what we are meant to do, money comes to us, doors open for us, we feel useful, and the work we do feels like play to us.
name: Julia Cameron

quote: Nothing is really work unless you would rather be doing something else.
name: James M. Barrie

quote: It is not real work unless you would rather be doing something else.
name: James M. Barrie

quote: Evil gains work their punishment.
name: Sophocles

quote: I was looking for a husband, but meanwhile to survive, I had to work.
name: Helen Reddy

quote: I know some people say it's not the best to work with your family, but I have never understood that because it's always worked so well for me.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: A little girl who finds a puzzle frustrating might ask her busy mother (or teacher) for help. The child gets one message if her mother expresses clear pleasure at the request and quite another if mommy responds with a curt 'Don't bother me - I've got important work to do.'
name: Daniel Goleman

quote: It's a lot easier to do good work when you have good words to say and work with good people.
name: Mark Harmon

quote: The best plan now is to have as many bosses as possible. I call it boss diversity. If you work for a company and you have one boss and that boss doesn't like you or wants to get rid of you, you're in trouble. quote: The test of the artist does not lie in the will with which he goes to work, but in the excellence of the work he produces.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: It is possible to demonstrate God's existence, although not a priori, yet a posteriori from some work of His more surely known to us.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: I'm free of stress and worries now because if I don't like something I'm doing, I just find the fun in it instead of being miserable. Let me have fun with the people I work with, let me have fun making money - when I grew up so poor, ya know?
name: Jenny McCarthy

quote: Pray thee, spare, thyself at times: for it becomes a wise man sometimes to relax the high pressure of his attention to work.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Now this relaxation of the mind from work consists on playful words or deeds. Therefore it becomes a wise and virtuous man to have recourse to such things at times.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: I've always wanted to work with Warren Beatty.
name: Quentin Tarantino

quote: When you're around me and really see that all I do is live and breathe for my work, it's not strange, it's just Gaga.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: I work very hard, but when God opens that door for you - when life opens that door for you, I should say - I think it's important to be giving, to return the love back.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: I believe we should work to end all racism in American society and staunchly defend the inherent rights of every person.
name: Rand Paul

quote: Artists don't talk about art. Artists talk about work. If I have anything to say to young writers, it's stop thinking of writing as art. Think of it as work.
name: Paddy Chayefsky

quote: I don't try to focus on anything that doesn't affect me personally and how I go out there every single day. I'm just going to continue to work hard and focus on what I can control.

quote: Authority doesn't work without prestige, or prestige without distance.
name: Charles de Gaulle

quote: The only time some people work like a horse is when the boss rides them.
name: Gabriel Heatter

quote: I am a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
name: Stephen Leacock

quote: I felt I really wanted to back off from music completely and just work within the visual arts in some way. I started painting quite passionately at that time.
name: David Bowie

quote: As Americans, we don't see the role of government as guaranteeing outcomes, but allowing free men and women to flourish based on their own vision, their hard work and their personal responsibility.
name: Rick Perry

quote: Seek the lofty by reading, hearing and seeing great work at some moment every day.
name: Thornton Wilder

quote: We've got gays working there. If they can demonstrate long-term relationships, we make same-sex benefits available just as we do with common-law marriages. Gays are productive people. Some fly airplanes, some work in breweries.
name: Pete Coors

quote: Create like a god, command like a king, work like a slave.
name: Constantin Brancusi

quote: To write the lives of the great in separating them from their works necessarily ends by above all stressing their pettiness, because it is in their work that they have put the best of themselves.
name: Simone Weil

quote: The contemporary form of true greatness lies in a civilization founded on the spirituality of work.
name: Simone Weil

quote: People who make the choice to study, work hard or do whatever they endeavor is to give it the max on themselves to reach to the top level. And you have the people who get envy and jealous, yet are not willing to put that work in, and they want to get the same praise.
name: Evander Holyfield

quote: He who seeks rest finds boredom. He who seeks work finds rest.
name: Dylan Thomas

quote: I love my work with a frenetic and perverse love, as an ascetic loves the hair shirt which scratches his belly.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: There is no higher religion than human service. To work for the common good is the greatest creed.
name: Woodrow Wilson

quote: I don't feel right unless I have a sport to play or at least a way to work up a sweat.
name: Hank Aaron

quote: My work is a game, a very serious game.
name: M. C. Escher

quote: The bottom line is, when people are crystal clear about the most important priorities of the organization and team they work with and prioritized their work around those top priorities, not only are they many times more productive, they discover they have the time they need to have a whole life.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: You musn't force sex to do the work of love or love to do the work of sex.
name: Mary McCarthy

quote: You can't get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.
name: Jerry West

quote: Choose a field that will supply sufficient remuneration to provide adequately for your companion and your children. I bear testimony that these criteria are very important in choosing your life's work.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Success represents the 1% of your work which results from the 99% that is called failure.
name: Soichiro Honda

quote: If somebody says no to you, or if you get cut, Michael Jordan was cut his first year, but he came back and he was the best ever. That is what you have to have. The attitude that I'm going to show everybody, I'm going to work hard to get better and better.
